text: Tamen bei zhu chu guxiang, zhi yin tamen chang shuo: Women de zhu shi zhenzhu. Yao bushi zhenzhu yi shiren huxiang dikang, name xuduo xiudaoyuan, libaitang, youtai huitang, qingzhensi--qizhong chang youren jinian zhenzhu zhi ming de jianzhu wu--biding bei ren pohuaile. Fan fuzhu zhenzhu de dadao zhe, zhenzhu biding fuzhu ta; zhenzhu que shi zhi qiang de, que shi wanneng de.
